Module com.game
Package com.game

Class MyFrame.SnakeObject

java.lang.Object
com.game.MyFrame.SnakeObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
Food, MyFrame.MySnake
Enclosing class:
MyFrame
public abstract static class MyFrame.SnakeObject extends Object
The general areas of state information set are:
  • The x,y coordinates of the snake
  • The image of the snake body
  • The width and height of the frame
  • The game end variable, l
An abstract class that is implemented by MyFrame.MySnake.

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public abstract void draw(Graphics g)
      The abstract draw class is used as a general function implement drawing, and in this case it is for the snake body and food. This is called during the Paint function call of MyFrame, used whenever repainting and initialisation.
      Parameters:
      g - The graphic parameter pertaining to MyFrame

    • getRectangle

      public Rectangle getRectangle()
      This is used solely on Food that implements this abstract class. It would be recommended to remove this and implement this separately. Its role is in collision detection when a snake eats a piece of food, using the rectangle property intersects.
      Returns:
      Returns a rectangle to be used in collision detection
